website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty grill set complete with all the essentials. Tops our list for its high-quality craftsmanship that’s synonymous with the brand name.
pros: Stainless-steel construction is sturdy and durable enough for years of use
Extra long heat-resistant handles are designed to place a good amount of distance between your hands and the heat of the flames
Beautifully presented in a sleek aluminum case that's compact enough for easy storage and portability
Spatula has a nifty built-in bottle opener
cons: Large tongs can be a bit tricky for smaller hands to grip comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools, Poor Storage Case
customer_reviews.text: At first the kit is shiny, new and gorgeous. Tools are perfect, no problem with them. My problem is the case. It's is mostly made of cardboard, so if stored in a humid environment, like a shed or garage during hummind summer days, IT WILL GROW MOLD. I used it a few times and it was fine. But after a very hummind, rainy 2 week period, opened the case to find lots of fuzzy mold. My suggestion is to store in the house away from moisture or pull out the black tool storage liners (2), pull the cardboard backing off and put in a new case. Other than the tool storage case issue, the tools are perfection.
customer_reviews.author: PAPA-G

customer_reviews.title: Meh, decent spatula for the price of the kit.
customer_reviews.text: Not very satisfied with this purchase. I would not buy again or even give it as a gift. First time using the tongs and I could not pick up a 6oz chicken breast filet. The tongs are very flimsy and immediately bend when you try to close them to pick up whatever it is you are using it to pick up. The only “tools” in this grill kit that I found useful were the corn cob holders and the basting brush. The spatula is alright with me but im not a fan of the serration on the side of it, but the bottle opener was a great idea just weird placement.
customer_reviews.author: ADocampo13

customer_reviews.title: Quality but unwieldy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case, very large utensils. Seems like great quality. Tongs are unreasonably large and difficult to use. Spatula is overkill as well. Maybe if I was cooking giant pieces of meat. I made some huge skirt steak and used the tongs for that but otherwise meh. Basically I got this just for the grill brush because the other items are useless imo. Still quality tho, just too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set in a nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift set! These bbq tools are well made and should last a very long time. The bonus is the nice aluminum storage case. I got these for my husband to keep in our travel trailer. Everything packs into a neat, hard case that will store easily. Tools are sturdy and should last many, many years of camping and grilling. I can't wait to give them to him.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: We love this grill set
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill set. We ended up with 2 when the first one we ordered was damaged. We gave the new one to our father in law and kept the damaged one (the box was crushed) and love it even without the awesome case! My father in law cleans all the utensils, puts them in the case, and then leaves the case in the grill cabinet so its always there, clean, and ready for him!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: this has all you need for simple grilling or BBQing. The case is a great add, I can keep it all in one place and only have to look for the case when I need the items. Looks sharp, seems like it will hold up over the season. Bought at the treasure truck so receiving the item was a great ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry King

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his grill set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for husband for Father's day, because he needed a new set and he absolutely loves the set; especially since it comes in a fancy case.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Grill brush is the worst I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this set other than the wire grill brush. The base of the grill brush is made of a plastic that melted from incidental very momentary contact with the metal grill surface when cleaning the grill while hot. Why would the manufacturer select this material? Also have found the metal wires from the brush in the grease pan, which I’ve never experienced with other grill brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Bling Bling

customer_reviews.title: Not so great...
customer_reviews.text: This kit kinda sucks...Its not very easy to get things back in to the storage box, and the items included are just not that great. I think the only thing I actually still use if the corn on the cob holders, and maybe the grill brush. The tings are absolutely worthless. At least the box it all comes in looks fairly cool. I guess at $29, I should not have expected much...
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tarquin

customer_reviews.title: Great set at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set. And it’s great that it has a good case for storage. Very masculine. He found a similar set at Williams Sonima for way more than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb4you

customer_reviews.title: Poor case good tools
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/2018: Still using the spatula and tongs 3 or 4 times a week for the grill. Still look as good as the day I bought them. I have since, however, lost the corn holders and the wire brush. Never used either anyway. Utensils are awesome! Case not so much. Case is bad already now I have to find another way to store the Utensils. It formed some kind of fuzzy mold or maybe spider mite webs. Either way throw the case out as soon as you get it, or if you can just buy the spatula and tongs separately. Since those are the 2 most used untensils when grilling, and this is a great spatula and tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Plow9

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father’s Day. All the basic tolls you need, replacement brush head for cleaning the grill... Durable. Overall we would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew grills out - A LOT! Bought this for him for Christmas and he loves it. Uses it all the time and cares for it as if it were made of gold. Great set and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Shipped an obviously damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Set seems decent quality, but the case is not. Very thin metallic veneer. Was delivered with a large hole smashed into the side, breaking the metallic veneer, wood substrate, and tearing the fabric inside. There was a piece of tape covering the hole in the cardboard sleeve around it, and the shipping box was undamaged. Meaning it was damaged beforehand, not in transit, and they shipped it anyways. Set might be fine, but not from this distributor. Case is pretty cheap either way.
customer_reviews.author: matthew newman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Love the case. Good purchase for price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. Our neighbors gave us a grill and we needed to get the basic tools. Despite other reviews, the case was nice and all of the utensils fit perfectly. This is a good purchase for the price. We have used everything except for the corn holders and so far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. C

customer_reviews.title: Tongs are worthless
customer_reviews.text: The set is great except for the tongs. I struggled to t baby back ribs flipped, dropped 2 hot dogs and threw them across the yard. Other than that, the set is great. I'll be replacing the tongs with something better.
customer_reviews.author: GoHeels

customer_reviews.title: I give 2 stars only because the contents are pretty nice. However when I received my package I ...
customer_reviews.text: I give 2 stars only because the contents are pretty nice. However when I received my package I opened it up to find a case that was bent out of shape on one side and didn't close. As I was intending to use it that day, I bent it back in shape myself (the case is of cheap easily bent material) and went ahead and kept it. Good grilling tools, but the busted case was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to my son for a pre-wedding-shower gift so he wouldn't feel left out with the bridal shower:) - what is a mom for right?! Anyway he's a griller big time and oh my goodness if it isn't too cute - wherever he goes he brings his little grilling "brief case" as we like to call it - it's got great tools within and the corn holders are very sharp and good as well! Then my husband got jealous asking why did our son get one and not him - need I say more - hence we purchased yet one more and my husband and I use this all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought this on special
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case came with a missing handle. Some of the implements seem flimsy and cheaply made. I am glad I bought this on special. We will still use it but it isn't what we were expecting. Maybe we just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wright

customer_reviews.title: They don’t seem like they’re for the grill they’re too short
customer_reviews.text: They are flimsy and the utensils are so short you almost burn your hands trying to cook
customer_reviews.author: Sherra

customer_reviews.title: Weak tongs
customer_reviews.text: The rings in this kit are weak. They have too much flex to even pick up a chicken breast. The case is convenient and so far have used all tools successfully except the Tonga are nearly pointless
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Tools in a Fancy Box
customer_reviews.text: These tools are nothing but cheap. The thongs are extremely flexable and barely pick up meat. The cleaning brush is flat, so you cannot get any torque or pressure on cleaning. All the money is in the fancy, plastic case. Avoid at all costs or regift it in a office gift exchange.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Best grilling utensils kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: High quality, well made stainless steel grill utensils packed in a nice carrying case. Excellent gift for anyone who owns a grill.
customer_reviews.author: Coolrunning

customer_reviews.title: Probably pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a groomsman's gift and the guys love it. I haven't used it myself but they say they're great. Would they lie to me if they hated them? Yes. But it's Cuisinart and the price isn't back. The case, which I did see and handle, seems very solid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taone

customer_reviews.title: The tongs can't even hold a steak!
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are completely useless. They can't even grab a steak and hold it. They bend immediately. You can grab as hard as you want on your finger and you'll barely feel it. And without the tongs the rest of the kit is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Jame Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great product - bad packaging!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great! I bought it for my husband for father's day, and we're all greatly impressed and enjoying the quality and beauty of the items. The only problem I had was with the very poor packaging. Throwing it in a box with some air poppers on top will not protect the item very well. My box came with a slight dent on the outside, and the case that holds the grill set was completely smashed. Not a big deal, as luckily I ordered it soon enough to have it exchanged for a new one in time for the big day. Just FYI. I would definatley recommend this to product to anyone, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Lee

customer_reviews.title: Husband uses all the time
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought these a few years ago and really liked them. They’ve held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah testa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for the Man in My Life! Gorgeous Grill Master Set!
customer_reviews.text: This griller’s gift, a set of easy to use, durable quality and ease of cleaning is the reason I bought this for someone so particular in The Taste of Particularly Spectacular Taste in Grilled Outdoor Cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The case looks nice but it's junk.
customer_reviews.text: I left the box in the sun and it pretty much melted. the utensils are good but I mainly bought this because of the nice case. This product is currently in a landfill or even possibly the ocean right now.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Has all the tools you need to get started
customer_reviews.text: These pieces have server their purpose as their first set. While the case they came in is a neat concept, it's not practical. I don't keep my cooking tools in a case. Also, after some use, the tong grips are beginning to loosen and feel flimsy. These will get you by as a starter set. I would imagine as you get more serious about grilling, you may beginning to kick yourself on not splurging on a more pricier/durable set.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of grilling tools
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this set was so cheap. It's got everything you need for grilling and each piece feels surprisingly high quality. It all works great. I've used it probably a dozen or more times and it hasn't suffered any loss of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: The case can’t stand the heat.
customer_reviews.text: The grill tools are decent enough. They are basically identical to a million other similarly priced sets. Really I just bought this one because I also ordered the Cuisinart grill as well. Anyway, the case as you can see in the picture is not terribly well made and if you leave it on the side table of the grill long enough to grill a couple of burgers it will melt off. But again for the price they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Will Evan Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ essential
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was a Amazon truck buy. Love it! Only thing I found a bit cumbersome is the tongs. I have little hands, so hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a grill master
customer_reviews.text: I sent this gift to a men's white elephant exchange with my partner - it was a hit. It's quality impressed even my uncles who all have grilling sets. They all wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby123

customer_reviews.title: A fair kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's quite the little kit I wish the tongs were a bit stiffer but other than that everything I've used was good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The utensils themselves look fine but the storage case it came in is falling ...
customer_reviews.text: The utensils themselves look fine but the storage case it came in is falling apart. I opened the case and the cloth lining is coming off the backing. I would return it but kinda need it and like I said, the utensils seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Funboy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband to go with his new grill. He loves the set! It has all the basic essential needs, easy to clean, and comes in a nice storage box. Great for gifting!
customer_reviews.author: V. V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, and generic
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, and I bought it because I absolutely love Cuisinart products... but not this grill set. It's made generic and the tongs hardly even pick up the meat I grill, or corn on the cob, or anything in that matter. It's a challenge and I'll be replacing the tongs with another brand definitely! I was completely disappointed in this seeing how it's Cuisinart and I had high expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T.

customer_reviews.title: Tools are great, case is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Each of the individual items within the case are well built, sturdy, and can take a beating. The inclusions are pretty standard, and I don't have much to say otherwise about the spatula, brush, etc. No one should be disappointed with those. The case, however, is a completely different story. It feels cheap and began falling apart almost immediately. As long as you're not buying for the case, you'll be happy. If the case is a sticking point, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: CUISINART STAINLESS GRILL SET VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, but case and attachments within case are not as secure as I'd have liked. I was surprised based on my past experience with Cuisinart. When it arrived several of the small items in the case were lose and floating free in the case. Small scratches on larger tools due to small pieces not secured. The items themselves are excellent, sturdy where needed, flexible where needed. Clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jaryl K. Day

customer_reviews.title: Brush is soft and melts
customer_reviews.text: Needed a grill brush, the brushes melted off and transferred rubber or whatever it was to our food. Used it on a cool grill as well with t replacement brush set. Use what you’ve got as far as spatula and rings and purchase a good temp proof grill brush.
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad casing
customer_reviews.text: Items work well, just the case came dented and the bands that hold everything in place were all loose and falling off
customer_reviews.author: allen hollander

customer_reviews.title: The box fell apart within a month
customer_reviews.text: The box fell apart within a month. The appliances are good no doubt, but the box is the most fragile piece of storage I have ever used. There is a level of sturdiness and rigidity that you expect out of a tool box for something like an outdoor grill, and this is definitely not one that comes to mind. Shame Cuisineart.
customer_reviews.author: MiHiiR

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a white elephant gift and ended up losing it in the game. I’m still mad about that, it’s a really nice set and my bro-in-law really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Bellana

customer_reviews.title: ok....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiancé. He seems adequately pleased with the product however I am a little slightly disappointed in the quality. I thought the quality of the product would be a little better than what I received. This would be an acceptable gift for any man however I would not consider it to be extremely valuable quality.
customer_reviews.author: roxaphi

customer_reviews.title: We obviously did not and the growth that gre in there was horrible. We tried cleaning it up and letting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the items are completely dry before placing them in the box. We obviously did not and the growth that gre in there was horrible. We tried cleaning it up and letting it dry completely before using it again, but the growth kept growing. It was gross!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my dad and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a house warming gift for mu son he loved it and put it to use the same day. The presentation is awesome
customer_reviews.author: clara Ramírez

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay grill set for the price. I do have 2 complaints about it though. 1. I wish the tongs had some way to lock them closed. 2. The rings are fairly small at the end so I can't hang them from the hooks on my weber grill. These are minor though and can be remedied with some leather cord.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present, person who I gave it too still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: RedRusskii

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing!! Great quality! I also love the attention to detail; the box set it comes in for storage great plus! I recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend that likes to bar-be-que. She seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Harold F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The tongs are really bad, hard to catch food
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are really bad, hard to catch food, other cheaper tongs are way better, this looks good, but doesnt perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Its a great set, comes with a spare grill wire brush ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great set, comes with a spare grill wire brush attachemnt. One downside is once the pieces are dirty you dont want to stick them back in the nice box. So you have to clean things up first and then put them away?
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_

customer_reviews.title: Grill away
customer_reviews.text: Happy birthday. Hubby was very happy to get these and the first cookout on the deck they were put to use. The lining of the box came apart in one small area but that wasn't a big deal. They are VERY nice utensils for grilling and will be used quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Skornicka

customer_reviews.title: The set was nice but the inside of the case molded and ruined ...
customer_reviews.text: The set was nice but the inside of the case molded and ruined everything inside of it. I had seen the reviews and it had happened to other people but I ignored it and bought it anyways. I think it's the velvet material in the case that molds
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: like!
customer_reviews.text: Great tools for a great price! This kit had all of the essential tools. All of the good quality and functionality you would expect from Cuisinart. Best part is the durable and attractive case. They utensils don't take up a whole kitchen drawer and everything is stored together. I'll buy another set the next time it goes on sale for tailgating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: GOT THIS AS A WEDDING GIFT
customer_reviews.text: I got this piece as a wedding gift. It's relatively cheap and it is of great quality. My husband absolutely loves it. Has a nice finish, the case is really nice and all the pieces work fine. I would definitely give this set as a present to a friend of mine. The price is just right for a present that costs little but looks like a million. =)
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. This is stainless steel, but when washed the water gets inside the tools and rusted the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jumm john

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well and there were no dents or digs in the case. Seems like a very nice set, but I am gifting it to my father so I can not speak to the durability or lifespan of the set, or how easy it is to clean. I know he will be very happy, and I got it for a discount price through a lightening deal.
customer_reviews.author: Zeml1774

customer_reviews.title: cheap material - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made. make yourself a favor and buy something else. i have been using it for one month. in total 5 BBQ's and its useless now. the material metal is cheap and think and it started bending now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good grill set
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good grilling set. I like the tongs and the spatula, though I do not really like the serrated edge on the side of it, which, I assume is meant to be used like a knife, but it is kind of awkward to use as a knife and just make the spatula a challenge to use without cutting yourself. I also feel that the grill scrubber bristles were kind of flimsy, though I admit I don't have a lot of experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my husband for valentines. He loves it! We had loose pieces before and they were ok, this set is very nice and the case is the best after you are done grilling you wash them and back they go to their case and you are never looking around the kitchen when it comes to grill time. They look very nice, which is always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Acy

customer_reviews.title: Friends Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift on sale for a friend and he loves it. We actually grilled out together so he could use the tools. Worked much better than his old system (fork and knife).
customer_reviews.author: TeachFaDays

customer_reviews.title: I really like that this set comes in a portable case
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. I really like that this set comes in a portable case. Seems to be good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! The quality of this set is good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KML101

customer_reviews.title: Damaged case
customer_reviews.text: One side of the case is damaged. I wish I had noticed before today since this was a Christmas gift. I cannot comment on the tool set itself since it being a gift I don’t want to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: mold set in pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the garage when I am done using it. I opened it up for the third time to use it and it was all moldy (green and white growth) all over the inside. Somehow condinsation got in the closed case and ruined what was a good bbq tool set.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Grill Utensils
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set of stainless steel grill utensils at a great price. It also comes in a really nice aluminum carry case. The set is made by Cuisinart and is of very good quality. I recommend this item for anyone with an outdoor grill and suits you even better if you are taking your grill on the fly,as the utensils are easily carried in their case.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra1650

customer_reviews.title: super fast shipping..very happy
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a BBQ gift item in December is tough in our small town and time was slipping away for Christmas gift shipping. Amazon to the rescue. Found a fantastic gift for son that he just loves! says he feels like a GANGSTA at the BBQ with this snazzy metal case and all the high quality tools. Item shipped to upper MI with time for a wrap job and back in the box to ship to Lexington KY with time to spare..Thanks we got it right this time
customer_reviews.author: Derek Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was actually shocked at viewing the initial quality of the product. I was worries it would just be another set that would get ruined and break easily because of the cheap price, but the utensils are very sturdy and it looks nice and sleek. I will have to update after a seasons use on the island to find out more.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This set , along with the carrying case made of metal, was an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: New griller..
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new grill and needed some accessories. I LOVE these! They not only look flashy but also serve a purpose.. The only drawback I will say is that the tongs are kinda flimsy.. If you try and pick up anything over a 1/2 lb steak they get kinda squirmy.. I can deal with it though. I would buy again A+
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: THis was a gift set that I originally got for my husband. We use it all the time, and it does hold up well. Yes it's not the most AMAZING or high tech- but it looks great as a gift and it also has held up really well to our hot grill, heavy sauces, and dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tools flimsy case
customer_reviews.text: They arrived with a horrible dent in the case which was not very assuring. Although the cosmetics are a minor complaint. Inside they are beautiful, elegant and sleek. They got snug in the case with any irritating rattling. They also look gender neutral, so they make a great gift for anyone. Great set of tools for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ... tools for cooking was broken and the tools looked good but were not of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend However the box that held the tools for cooking was broken and the tools looked good but were not of good quality
customer_reviews.author: David h.

customer_reviews.title: I'm the grill master
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the grill set. Everything worked great except for the grill cleaner. The pad broke off on the first use and I lost a few of the screws. The only thing I would fix is that with this set is to make the grill cleaner pad a little more heavy duty to where it attaches to the handle.. I like using everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Thong

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hotel and its a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Amato

customer_reviews.title: We liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for my hubby.. I like that it’s not bulky at all. The grasping tool is not his favorite though.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia V. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Well received as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a thank you gift for some very kind folks who we visited last spring. Their response was charming as the Husband, who can safely be called a "guy's guy", enjoyed not only the quality of the tools but the James Bond 007 style of the case. Best, Joe
customer_reviews.author: Lahaina Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great set, cool corn holders
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful father's day give, great size - perfect amount of tools and super cool corn holders!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Lott-Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice grill set. I'm excited to give this as a gift to my step-dad because I know he will love it. The tools are great quality for the price and the case is nice as well. Very pleasantly surprised!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pleasing design.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is there in a wonderful case. A surprise was the corn holders.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Shahid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. It's versatile and takes the place of so many other appliances. Being a single and with limited space it was a perfect addition to my well used kitchen. Everyone needs one of these. And being in its own case means that it's very easy to store. Great for those of us who are organizationally challenged
customer_reviews.author: L. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Treasure truck mishap.
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up from the treasure truck. It had clearly been subjected to water damage. The “aluminum” outside was bubbling and dented. The cardboard had fused to it and left behind residue and the inside was filled with mold. Wtf guys.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lewer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: While the individual grill tools and case look very nice, some of the components are poorly designed or of poor quality. The tongs are very difficult to use, too stiff to grab and maneuver food. Worse of all, the grill cleaner tool fell apart in less than 4 uses. The head became dislodged from the handle and is unusable. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn H

customer_reviews.title: and the way the metal is bent doesnt make it very useful for picking up heavier pieces of meat
customer_reviews.text: The main tool I wanted this thing for was the tongs.... and the way the metal is bent doesnt make it very useful for picking up heavier pieces of meat.... I had to bend it more inwards in order to achieve this. A tad more flimsy than I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Oetken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grill kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for my family. I bought it for my husband for father's day. Everything he needs is in one convenient kit. The spatula is long enough to keep him from burning his hands when flipping burgers. I love having a case to keep it organized.
customer_reviews.author: Abook

customer_reviews.title: Great grill set for dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my father for father's day. His old grill tools were old and beat up. He loves the look of the case and how easy it is to keep it organized. He loves that they even include corn cob holders. The classic stainless finish makes it easy to tell if the utensils are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Watchguy

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of them for Christmas gifts. Family love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets for Christmas gifts and all I got was positive feedback. It comes in a hard metal case and has easy organization places for everything. All you need to do is wash the utensils and put back for the next time you Bar-B-Q.
customer_reviews.author: Marielizabeth

customer_reviews.title: good gift for my grilling man
customer_reviews.text: bought this set as a gift to mark the opening of grilling season, and it was well received. the quality of the tools is great and we are having no problems. the stainless is durable and a good weight, and washes well by hand. i would buy this again, especially because the case is so funny and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice stainless grill set. The storage case is an added bonus. The handles are weighted and the length is made for the grill. My husband was very pleased with the gift and impressed with the quality. Fast shipping and a good price. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools.
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart who is know for quality in the kitchen, is now known for quality at the grill in my house! I love this set. They are comfortable, easy to use, and last a very long time. I use them and put them right in the dishwasher. They look brand new and have been used over a season.
customer_reviews.author: Soundaround

customer_reviews.title: It's Stainless!
customer_reviews.text: This set isn't a fancy wood-laden, handcrafted, etched masterpiece, but you don't pay for that. Being stainless, these tools can handle some abuse or loose maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Moose

customer_reviews.title: looks awesome. I never knew I needed gourmet corn-holders
customer_reviews.text: really striking set, looks awesome. I never knew I needed gourmet corn-holders, but now I will never eat another ear of corn without them.
customer_reviews.author: doublea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: I received the grill set as a "just because" gift and I really like it! Almost every tool needed for a cookout is included in the kit. The set is aesthetically pleasing, and although I haven't used any of the pieces my father-in-law, who has the same kit has. Overall good gift and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MANsion

customer_reviews.title: Better than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and better !!!! On time delivery Durable Very nice presentation of the product and carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead954

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of purchasing this set because of the low price. I thought it might be cheaply made, but I'm happy to say that I was wrong! the case is very nice and the utensils are heavy duty. pretty typical cuisinart quality. And thanks to Amazon Prime it arrived in 2 days, yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling set
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this as an xmas gift and I was very impressed and happy with the product. The case is aluminum and plastic (I am guessing) and the utensils themselves are very sturdy stainless steel. They are very well constructed and heavy duty. I would recommend this to anyone who is serious about grilling and loves high quality products.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great Father’s Day gift. He used it on the grill and the charcoal side of the grill. He seems to be enjoying the set. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CGS-5014 Deluxe Grill Set, 14-Piece, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:Deluxe Grill Set, 14-PieceInnovative culinary tools are the Cuisinart signature. The prestigious Cuisinart brand is not limited to their famous food processors - plugged or unplugged, nobody covers the modern chef like Cuisinart. Cuisinart is a full-service culinary resource with a wide array of products, preferred by chefs and favored by consumers. And now you can take the world famous Cuisinart brand to your patio, lawn, tailgate, or campsite with their comprehensive line of Cuisinart outdoor grilling products available now on Amazon. Features: Set includes: Chef's Spatula Grill Tongs Silicone Basting Brush 4 Pairs of Corn Holders Cleaning Brush Extra Brush Head|Durable stainless steel|Deluxe Aluminum Storage Case|Elongated handles and convenient handle rings to help hang tools during grilling|Includes bonus $20 Omaha Steaks Gift Reward Card

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Grill set includes chef's spatula, grill tongs, silicone basting brush, 4 pairs of corn holders, cleaning brush, and extra brush head
Also includes aluminum storage case--perfect for the on-the-go griller
Elongated handles; convenient handle rings for hanging
Measures 7.1 by 3.2 by 17.3 inches; 1-year limited warranty
